name: Save Cat: Addictive Puzzle
description:
Solve physics puzzles to help an abandoned cat!

A kitty was abandoned in a park. It must face the world full of challenges. Give it a hand to find the way home

To help the kitty find water or food, draw an adequate shape then use the terrain skillfully and featured objects within the puzzle level. Don’t forget drive away the bad dog, any shape you draw can help kitty through the tough day.

You will unlock different environment and more interesting devices as the progress of puzzle levels.Basic physics knowledge and creativity will be the key to pass most levels.

HOW TO PLAY
· Draw any shapes you need in available area.
· Use different devices in the level environment.
· Help this cat achieve its wishes.
· No time limit!

FEATURES
· Freely and unrestraind drawing
· Open style puzzles, try make your own best solution.
· Delicate physics system and fun devices.
· The aim of most levels is different.
· The story of kitty will be continue in future updates.
